H0.text: All foods are solid is a true statement about all foods.

H1.text: All foods taste good is a true statement about all foods.

H3.text: All foods should be cooked is a true statement about all foods.

A4.text: Water is found in nearly all foods and has been defined as food by itself.

A5.text: Food is any substance consumed by an organism for nutritional support. Food usually consists of plant, animal, or fungal origin and contains essential nutrients such as carbohydrates, fats, proteins, vitamins, or minerals.
